alert.note: Alert for Harney County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:06PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Harney County through 645 PM PDT... At 606 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Foster Lake, or 33 miles south of Burns, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Narrows, Harney Lake, Buena Vista Field Station and western Malheur Lake around 640 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM PDT for southeastern Oregon.
